category_codes.description:
List of target categories' {@link IShoppingChannelCategory.code}s.

If empty, it means all categories of the channel is listing the sale.

items.description:
Creation information of the target channel (and categories) of sale to sell.

------------------------------

Description of the current {@link IShoppingSaleChannel.ICreate} type:

> Creation information of the target channel (and categories) of sale to sell.

type.description: Discriminant for the type of selectable option.

name.description: Represents the name of the option.

variable.description:
Whether the option is variable or not.

When type of current option is "select", this attribute means whether
selecting different candidate value affects the final stock or not.

name.description: Represents the name of the candidate value.

items.description:
Creation information of the candidate value.

------------------------------

Description of the current {@link IShoppingSaleUnitOptionCandidate.ICreate} type:

> Creation information of the candidate value.

Creation information of the selectable option.

------------------------------

Description of the current {@link IShoppingSaleUnitSelectableOption.ICreate} type:

> Creation information of the selectable option.

nominal.description:
Nominal price.

This is not {@link real real price} to pay, but just a nominal price to show.
If this value is greater than the {@link real real price}, it would be shown
like {@link IShoppingSeller seller} is giving a discount.


@minimum 0

option_index.description:
Target option's index number in
{@link IShoppingSaleUnit.ICreate.options}.

items.description:
Creation information of stock choice.

------------------------------

Description of the current {@link IShoppingSaleUnitStockChoice.ICreate} type:

> Creation information of stock choice.

choices.description:
List of choices.

Which candidate values being chosen for each option.

items.description:
Creation information of the stock.

------------------------------

Description of the current {@link IShoppingSaleUnitStock.ICreate} type:

> Creation information of the stock.

required.description:
Whether the unit is required or not.

When the unit is required, the customer must select the unit. If do not
select, customer can't buy it.

For example, if there's a sale "Macbook Set" and one of the unit is the
"Main Body", is it possible to buy the "Macbook Set" without the
"Main Body" unit? This property is for that case.

primary.description:
Whether the unit is primary or not.

Just a labeling value.

items.description:
Creation information of sale unit.

------------------------------

Description of the current {@link IShoppingSaleUnit.ICreate} type:

> Creation information of sale unit.

units.description:
List of units.

Records about individual product composition informations that are sold
in the sale. Each {@link IShoppingSaleUnit unit} record has configurable
{@link IShoppingSaleUnitOption options},
{@link IShoppingSaleUnitOptionCandidate candidate} values for each
option, and {@link IShoppingSaleUnitStock final stocks} determined by
selecting every candidate values of each option.


@minItems 1
